English:
Welcome to EVolve!
 

In this serious game we will do our best to try to teach you the basics concepts of electric vehicles (commonly refered to as EV).
Hrvatski:
Dobrodošli u EVolve!

 
U ovoj ozbiljnoj igri potrudit ćemo se naučiti Vas osnovne koncepte o električnim vozilima (poznatim kao EV).

English:
First things first, your statistics. 

They can be seen on the right of the screen and are as follows:

• time - current time that has passed

• battery - your battery level

• distance - how much you have to go until the end

• speed - how fast you're going

• consumption - how much of your battery you're consuming
Hrvatski:
Prvo nešto o vašoj statistici.

Statistiku možete vidjeti na desnoj strani ekrana sljedećim redoslijedom:

• vrijeme - trenutno vrijeme koje je proteklo

• baterija - vaša razina baterije

• udaljenost - udaljenost do cilja

• brzina - koliko brzo se krećete

• potrošnja - koliko baterije trošite

English:
The goal of the game is simple. You are a driver in an electric vehicle (EV).

And you want to get to your desired distance as quickly as possible.
Hrvatski:
Cilj igre je jednostavan. 

Vi ste vozač u električnom vozilu (EV). Želite proći zadanu udaljenost u što kraćem vremenskom roku.

English: This is a charging station. It will recharge your battery, but you will have to spend some time.
Hrvatski: Ovo je stanica za punjenje. Ona će vam napuniti bateriju ali morat ćete potrošiti određeno vrijeme.
